ygData.subject: Re: gypsy camps
ygData.msgSnippet: I have used a combine for about 4 weeks.... the stats on all combines are exactly the same as fine-stell they just are classed as magic so they can hit ghouls
ygData.messageBody:
I have used a combine for about 4 weeks.... the stats on all combines are
exactly the same as fine-stell they just are classed as magic so they can
hit ghouls and other migic only creatures....

Regards
Cubious

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim West [SMTP:twest@...]
> Sent: 07 June 1999 19:56
> To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] gypsy camps
>
> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>

>
> Anyone using a combine 2 handed sword yet ? What are the stats for them
> and what can you expect to hit for with it. I am outgrowing my fine steel
> 2 handed sword and would like to make sure that it is worth getting a
> combine. My fine steel hits for 25Hp max.
